name: This Mess
description:
Good mornin’, sweetheart. Boise’ll be wakin’ up soon and that’s when our work starts. Wires go into the jacks. The left is incomin’ calls, the right is receivin’. You see a light, put it in the jack. Listen for their request and insert the wire. That button down there’s for you to listen in on a call if you need. Not sayin’ you can’t, but we ain’t payin’ you for that either.

Made for the 2018 Global Game Jam

Winner of Best Use of Theme at the NYU Game Center site!

Also nominated for Best Game Design and Best Overall Game!

Theme: Transmission

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/mess
